Summary: Saw a disk shaped object fly out of some cloud cover swing back and forth and flip over and fly back into cloud cover.
trends: There have been 28 other sightings in Irvine
There were no other sightings in Irvine on or around February 11th 2009
divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving to get food on my lunch break and as i was pulling into the parking lot of a Arbys returant in Irvine California i noticed a light coming from some clouds at first i thought it was just a plane but the light was to bright to be a plane so i continued to watch as the light came out of the clouds an realized it was a disc shape object with a bright solid white light around the edge of the whole disk with specks of light all over the surface of it, it came out of the clouds from the east and stopped right in front of the clouds and started to swing in the air like a pendulum it swung back and forth from north to south about 3 to five times and on the last up swing, it was towards the south, it flipped completely over and took off towards the south into some more clouds and i lost sight of it, this all happend within 2 to 5 minutes, after the event i was shocked i never thought i would see something like that in my life i called and texed some of my friends and my grandmother and told them wut i had just seen.
